reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.name: Love this game
reviews.text: Personality this game has a unique catch to it. Most mobile games have ads in the middle of each round but this app has one or two after 15 minutes. I enjoy the concept of this game and it is very entertaining when one is bored. I would recommend this game to the public. It’s has a fun strategy and can give people goals to achieve. Overall I think that this is an excellent game.

reviews.name: PLEASE DONT EXIT THE GAME
reviews.text: i have had around 5-6 million score with double coins and a add popped up so i accidentally pressed on it and it was frozen on a screen that said Connecting to the app store I was stuck forever so i just decided to close and enter the game again figuring out it would still continue the game but my old score was still there with nothing changed😕

reviews.title: Its not as good as before
reviews.name: Its not as good as before
reviews.text: Subway surf is a great game and made up half my childhood, but its not as good as it was before and its slightly more confusing, the avatar shop isnt the same as it was and now everything is so over priced. Its a great game but it was easier to play in 2017.

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.name: AMAZING
reviews.text: I’ve had this game as long as I can remember and that’s about seven years ! I like the game because u can play it offline as well but I’m not allowed to purchase money, and that’s not a big deal but the thing is ........ ITS ONE OF TGE MOST AMAZING GAMES IVE  EVER DOWNLOADED!!!!!!! There are missions, event , many different characters, and a bunch of challenges!!! Keep doing your job ( entertaining people) u r awesome and I can tell that this is one of the most successful games ever to be created and I just love this game !!!😁😁😁
